sentences.english: The crust of east China has been affected by extensional stress since the Mesozoic-Ceno-zoic.
sentences.chinese: 新生代以來，中國東部地殼一直處在引張應力作用下。

sentences.english: Cao Xiu donned his armor and rode into the city with 1, 000 men to stop the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 休急披掛上馬，引千餘人在城中拒敵。

sentences.english: Ancient words will guide us Home.
The farmers channel water from the river into the field.
sentences.chinese: 農民把水從河裏引到地裏。

sentences.english: The efficiency of algae removal by four algaecides for Luanhe River water was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了四種殺藻劑對引灤水中藻類的去除效能。

sentences.english: Barefaced attitude is exceeding and ambiguous fetching illusion is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 露骨的姿態極度曖昧引人幻想無限。

sentences.english: Since the beginning of the new century, the beginning of the large-scale introduction of this subject.
sentences.chinese: 從新世紀開始，這一學科開始被大規模的引進來。

sentences.english: They showed me into a bleak waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 他們引我來到一間陰冷的會客室。

sentences.english: By their nature, trains invite imagination.
sentences.chinese: 在本質上，火車引人遐想。

sentences.english: Which blog written in soft paper, citing spider fastest ah?
sentences.chinese: 在哪個博客寫軟文，引蜘蛛最快啊？

sentences.english: The teaching method of those famous professors is always quotes .
sentences.chinese: 名教授的授課方式從來都是引經論典的。

sentences.english: This is the hero of whom we are proud.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我們引爲自豪的英雄。

sentences.english: Weld the earth connecting cable on the floor net which also based on the floor system drawings.
sentences.chinese: 應根據接地系統圖，在地網上焊接接地引下線。

sentences.english: Dark red-violet powder, taste bitter, easy to absorb moist.
sentences.chinese: 本品爲棕黃色粉末，味微苦，引溼性強。

sentences.english: What caused the explosion in Monte Grande?
sentences.chinese: 什麼引起來蒙特格蘭德鎮的爆炸？
